name: Dialog
description: A modal dialog component with focus trap, backdrop, and accessible dismissal

accessibility.screenReader: Announces dialog title and description. Focus is trapped within dialog. Screen readers announce when dialog opens.

recommendedUsage: Use for important content that requires user attention or action. Use alertdialog role for critical confirmations.
antiPatterns: Do not use for non-essential content. Avoid nesting dialogs. Ensure there is always a way to close the dialog.
